cookie_policy_intro: We use cookies to understand how visitors use our site. Analytics and marketing cookies are only loaded if you accept them.
cookie_essential_purpose: Required for core website functionality such as remembering your cart and session.
cookie_essential_duration: Stored only for the duration of your session.
cookie_analytics_purpose: Help us understand how visitors interact with the site.
cookie_marketing_purpose: Used to personalize offers and measure campaign performance.
cookie_preferences_intro: You can update your cookie preferences at any time using the
cookie_preferences_outro: located at the bottom of the page.
